  4. Place 3 - Leon Leal

Place 3 - LEON LEAL

Email: Leon Leal 


  • Elected to Place 3 in 2019
  • Term expires: 2028

Current Committees

  • City Council Facilities Committee
  • City Council Audit Committee
  • Council Liaison – Convention and Visitors Advisory Board
  • Council Liaison, 1st Alternate - Board of Zoning Adjustment
  • GCISD Board Liaison
  • Crime Control and Prevention District Board
  • Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 1 
  • Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 2
  • Economic Development Corporation

Community Organization Service

  • GCISD Education Foundation Board 
  • GCISD Board of Trustees, past President, Vice President and Secretary
  • Baylor Regional Medical Center Board - past Board Member
  • State Board of Educator Certification - 2014-2019
  • Avid supporter/volunteer for Grapevine High School Baseball & Wresting programs
  • Grapevine Rotary Club member
  • Building Board of Appeals, past Council Liaison

Personal 

  • Grapevine resident since 1992
  • Married to Tracy Leal
  • Three sons
  • Graduate of University of Oklahoma
  • Owner of Abba Staffing & Consulting, Inc. and Abba Professional Group
  • Online
    Payments
  • Employment
  • Solid Waste
    & Recycling
  • Meeting VideoS
  • Report
    An Issue
  • Media
